synopsis.text: Will ing to sacrifice his remaining humanity for survival, Ken Kaneki, a half-human, half-ghoul hybrid, joins the militant ghoul faction Aogiri Tree after enduring relentless torture at their hands. As the Commission of Counter Ghoul (CCG) escalates their efforts to eradicate ghouls from Tokyo, Kaneki's former friends at the Anteiku coffee shop find their fragile peace threatened. Kaneki's newfound allegiance shrouds his true intentions in mystery, forcing his friends to question his loyalties. Meanwhile, the CCG braces for a confrontation with the formidable ghoul known as "Owl," who has caused them immense pain in the past. In this treacherous world where ghouls and humans coexist, Kaneki must navigate the fine line between man and monster while facing challenges that put his fleeting humanity at stake.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
